title: The Lumber-Room
description: Young Nicholas escapes the watchful eye of his aunt and discovers the hidden wonders of the lumber-room--a place where adults store odds and ends that, to a boy, seem like wondrous treasures.
meta: Use the reading strategy of visualization before and during reading
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast characters in the text
Suffixes : Identify and use the suffix -ly

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
